4dd217ba7542bb00a127f682e2c3ad27 (13:17): 7a57f5bab20dcaf42d8916dd02e7fac8: are you going to participate in WebApps?
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (13:18): we are just having a Widgets call now
4dd217ba7542bb00a127f682e2c3ad27 (13:18): this channel is open to EVERYONE!
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (13:18): and were pondering if you might want to join
7a57f5bab20dcaf42d8916dd02e7fac8 (13:19): I'm not seeing arve's on internal irc
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (13:19): wilhelm says arve not in the office
7a57f5bab20dcaf42d8916dd02e7fac8 (13:19): I would be happy to join, but I expect more work eslewhere and I would quickly be in bad standing
7a57f5bab20dcaf42d8916dd02e7fac8 (13:19): besides, I understand arve's staying on for now
4dd217ba7542bb00a127f682e2c3ad27 (13:37): If WebApps Chairs enforced Bad Standing we might as well close the WG :-)
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (13:39): 4dd217ba7542bb00a127f682e2c3ad27: I've never liked the "bad standing" thing
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (13:40): I think it discourages people from participating, if they can't participate every week or whatever
4dd217ba7542bb00a127f682e2c3ad27 (13:42): It does make sense, however, for Editors
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (13:43): 4dd217ba7542bb00a127f682e2c3ad27: yeah, for editors, of course
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (13:43): editors who aren't participating should just be removed as editors
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (13:43): plus, they should get a spanking
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (13:51): I wonder if we should have "bad standing" status for team contacts
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (13:52): we should have a "badass standing" status
